description: Default GSD to OpenCode transformation rules. Override by creating ~/.gfh/transforms.json with same structure.

approximations.tools: Mapped to OpenCode tools array if available
approximations.config: Merged into OpenCode agent config if present

suggestions.tools: OpenCode uses tool registration. Register tools via OpenCode tool API.
suggestions.config: OpenCode uses native config. Migrate settings to OpenCode's agent config format.

approximations.variables: Inlined into promptTemplate as template literals
approximations.agent: Stored in OpenCode command config if present

suggestions.variables: OpenCode uses template literals. Rewrite using {{variable}} syntax in promptTemplate.
suggestions.agent: OpenCode stores agent reference in config. Access via command.config.agent.
suggestions.conditionalExecution: Not available in OpenCode. Use agent routing or multiple commands instead.
suggestions.hooks: Not available in OpenCode. Implement hooks in your workflow scripts.

approximations.config: Merged into OpenCode model config if present

suggestions.config: OpenCode uses native config. Migrate settings to OpenCode's model config format.
suggestions.apiKey: OpenCode manages API keys via environment variables. Set OPENCODE_API_KEY or provider-specific env vars.
suggestions.rateLimits: Not available in OpenCode. Implement rate limiting in your application layer.

approximations.permissions: Not supported by OpenCode - logged as gap
approximations.custom: Merged into OpenCode settings if present

suggestions.permissions: OpenCode does not support GSD permissions. Configure security at the system level.
suggestions.custom: OpenCode merges custom config into settings. Review for compatibility.
suggestions.plugins: Install required OpenCode plugins manually via OpenCode plugin manager.
suggestions.pluginRequirements: Install required OpenCode plugins manually via OpenCode plugin manager.

fallback.suggestion: This GSD feature has no direct OpenCode equivalent. Review GSD documentation for alternatives.
